page.title: 13What my house is like
page.content: The house I live in is a terraced house .It has seven rooms. My mum's room is the biggest my two brothers have the middle size one and my room is the smallest but it is all right. Then there is the bathroom and the livingroom. The dining room has in it a table, a little settee and a stereo. In the kitchen there is a washing machine, a fridge and a cooker. The living room has two chairs and a settee, a gas fire and a T.V. Our house has a garden with a lot of flowers.It has not got a garage so we park the car on the road.
